item.description:
Where Your Sweet Pea isn’t the Only One Having Fun!!

The Sweet Pea Yoga weekend Meetup features Itsy Bitsy Yoga classes for Babies, Toddlers and Tykes to enjoy with their parent—on a Saturday!

Each Meetup will feature a simplified and fun-to-learn Itsy Bitsy Yoga class where new, occasional, and ongoing students can enjoy the developmentally sound yoga postures, sweet rhymes and songs that we have all come to love. We invite you to dance the Yogi Yogi, explore your Baby Planet and practice your Tree Pose in a safe, clean and welcoming environment.

Please, just 1 adult from each family may attend class at a time. Thank you for understanding.

TOTS Class Description:
Itsy Bitsy Yoga for Tots is a supportive, fun-loving, and active yoga class. As tot’s mobility increases, classes offer tot-centric poses that encourage and support their physical explorations. Tots become more confident in their moving bodies as they practice yoga both in and out of class.
During a Tots Itsy Bitsy Yoga class crawlers and walkers playfully practice yoga postures while they are standing, sitting up, walking, and jumping. Parents also get to do a little yoga, but no yoga experience is required.
item.name: Weekend Tots Yoga Meetup (March)
